items.sentence: How long have you been living on this island?
How many audiobooks do you have on your iPod?
I can hear Tom in the kitchen washing dishes.
I don\'t remember what we were talking about.
I don\'t think anyone could have stopped Tom.
I don\'t want to make a big deal out of this.
Tom, will you let me copy your math homework?
Tomorrow morning, wake me up at 6:00, please.
We are still hoping that Tom will get better.
We must have those parts by Monday afternoon.
When should I stop feeding my dog puppy food?
When was the last time you cleaned your room?
When was the last time you got your hair cut?
When was the last time you had a stomachache?
When was the last time you had your hair cut?
When was the last time you played the violin?
Why don\'t you just concentrate on your work?
Why don\'t you just tell me where you put it?
Why don\'t you pick on someone your own size?
Why don\'t you tell me the rest of the story?
Why don\'t you tell me what you want to hear?
Tom says he\'s not willing to take that risk.
Tom is one of the best wrestlers on the team.
Tom is playing with the kids in the backyard.
Tom is probably the best singer in our class.
Tom is still living at home with his parents.
Tom is the one who has to make that decision.
You\'re good at speaking French, aren\'t you?
You will soon get used to speaking in public.
Tom closed his eyes and began to count sheep.
I know you still blame Tom for Mary\'s death.
I know you\'re going through a lot right now.
I\'d like you to attend the meeting tomorrow.
I\'m sorry I made you wait for so long today.
I\'m very interested in what you have to say.
It\'s impossible for me to explain it to you.
It\'s impossible to learn English in a month.
If you push the button, the engine will stop.
Tom would\'ve done it already if he knew how.
How did you know that Tom wouldn\'t be there?
I can\'t afford to buy such an expensive car.
I can\'t afford to make that kind of mistake.
Tom and Mary probably don\'t know each other.
Tom said he heard Mary threaten to kill John.
Tom said he was too drunk to help me do that.
Tom said that he did his homework by himself.
The washing machine is making strange noises.
The whale is the largest animal on the earth.
There are many dishonest people in the world.
Tom and I usually speak French to each other.
